events.event: Palantir Technologies founded by Peter Thiel, Alex Karp, Nathan Gettings, Joe Lonsdale, Stephen Cohen
In-Q-Tel (CIA venture capital) provides $2 million seed investment
Development of Palantir Gotham platform for intelligence community
First major CIA contract - counterterrorism operations support
Expansion to FBI, NSA, DHS contracts
Reported use in operation that located Osama bin Laden (unconfirmed claims)
Palantir Foundry launched for commercial sector
Valuation reaches $9 billion in private funding round
ICE contracts for immigration enforcement - internal employee protests
Controversy over ICE contracts intensifies - employee walkouts, public criticism
Direct listing IPO at $10 per share, $21 billion valuation
Expansion of commercial contracts while maintaining government revenue base
Ukraine war support - providing intelligence platform for Ukrainian military
